#202059, #202071

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

comment.body:
Hello @AdamWr sorry to bother you. I hope I'm in the right place to ask, there has been some discussion around that issue (you can read more https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/issues/27884 and on some relevant subreddits). The filtering you applied is a bit too aggressive since it apparently also targets autopromotion (links that redirects to the website itself) with no tracking or any commercial stuff.

There has been a major support of those "user ads" by the RoyalRoad community, and a middle ground was found with uBO to be a bit more precise in the filtering. I'm sharing here so there is parity with the adblockers and everyone can be satisfied (users of RR and of adblockers)

We found a working (a bit too aggressive, but still largely better) solution with the following filter :

```adb
royalroad.com##.dKKumhSnWiFq75vPUVtmTanQ:has(a[href^="https://www.royalroad.com/a/r?campaign="]:not([href*="&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.royalroad.com"]))
```

This will catch any link that redirects to a website that is not RoayRoal.

Thank you for reading this message, and thank you for your work, I know it's not easy.

Have a nice day / evening :)
